Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Urrrgh...I don't feel so hot. My head's spinning
and I feel dizzy. Yeah...bed...I oughtta get to my
bed.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I think I'm gonna lie down for the rest of the day.
I'm sure if I just rest, I'll be a-okay by tomorrow.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ngh...my head is pounding. I can't concentrate
like this. I think I should lie down...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>, but I'm going to try to
rest for the remainder of the day. I should feel
better by tomorrow, though.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ugh. I'm really not feelin' very fresh right now.
But I've got so much to do...! Still, hard to argue
with this queasiness...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. I don't want this to get
worse than it is, so I'm going to lie down and
rest for today.
<PAGE>
Hopefully, that'll do the trick and I'll up and
running again tomorrow.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Nnnnh. All of a sudden, I don't feel so well. I
must have pushed a little over my limits the
other day.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>, but I think I am going to
spend today resting. I should be refreshed and
raring to go tomorrow.
<PAGE>
Good night.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ugh...I feel so bleeeah. At this rate, I ain't gonna
get much done. Better to just lie down, rest, and
recuperate. Man, that sucks.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. I'm gonna rest for today.
Can you handle stuff for the rest of the day?
Thanks. G'night.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh, I'm not feelin' my usual, beautiful self. Am I
coming down with something? Well, one thing's
for sure, I can't work like this.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. I'm going to lie down and
rest for the day. I'm sure I'll make a fabulous
recovery by tomorrow, though.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Blech. I feel so stuffy-headed and lethargic.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I think some extra rest is what I need today. I
expect I will be better by tomorrow, though.
Could you please handle the chores for today?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh dear. I've been shuffling along like a zombie
ever since this morning.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I think I'll take this opportunity to rest for the
day. Hopefully this will all blow over by
tomorrow. Good night.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ugh...I-I don't feel so good. I've been getting the
chills all day, too. I think I'm getting sick.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I should probably lie down and rest for the day,
just in case.
<PAGE>
I should be fine tomorrow, but could you please
handle the chores for today, <MYNAME>?
Thanks.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ulp...I'm not feelin' 100%. My head feels too
light, and the world's kinda see-sawing back and
forth, like on a boat...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. I'm gonna rest for today.
<PAGE>
I promise I'll be all better by tomorrow! Ugh...but
today, I just need to sleep. Good night...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hrm. I haven't been feeling well today. I might be
coming down with a cold.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I certainly don't want to expose you to the same
germs, <MYNAME>, so I think bed rest is just
what the doctor ordered, so to speak.
<PAGE>
I expect this will pass by tomorrow, but for
now, I should rest. Good night.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ngh...My head feels like it's stuffed with cotton
balls. Am I coming down with something?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sorry, but I think I'm gonna take the rest of the
day off and rest.
<PAGE>
I should be fine tomorrow, but for today, could
you handle the chores? Thanks. G'night,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh... Everything's all spinny...
<PAGE>
<FACE_BABY_1><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>My tummy hurts...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sleeeepy... Can I go to bed, now?
<PAGE>
<FACE_BABY_1><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD><PARENT>, I wanna hug... Can I go to bed, too?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Bleah...I feel bad...
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Me, too. And my head hurts.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<PARENT>, I feel too dizzy to walk. Pick me up? I
wanna go to bed...
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>I feel icky too. Maybe if we go to sleep, we'll feel
better later.
<PAGE>
<PARENT>, can we save up all of today's playing
and play double tomorrow, when we feel better?
I don't wanna lose any playing...
